zh.Setting.index.159182-0: 单击可切换菜单未选中/选中状态；操作父级菜单时，对应子菜单状态将默认与其同步，可以单独操作调整；支持拖拽菜单调整展示顺序。
zh.Setting.index.159182-3: 保存后当前系统菜单数据将被覆盖，确认操作？

en.Setting.index.159182-0: Click to switch between menu unselected/selected status; When operating the parent menu, the corresponding sub menu status will be synchronized with it by default and can be adjusted separately; Support dragging and dropping menus to adjust display order.
en.Setting.index.159182-3: After saving, the current system menu data will be overwritten. Are you sure about the operation?
